summary.span: 將 (或可以轉換成 的物件) 轉換為指定型別。

span.span: Converts an (or an object that can be cast to an ) to the specified type.

returns.span: 這個方法傳回轉換過的物件。

span.span: This method returns the converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的類型轉換為字串型別進行來回。The most common type conversion is to and from a string type. 預設實作會呼叫物件方法的物件是否有效，而且如果目標類型是字串。The default implementation calls the method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果這個方法無法將指定的物件轉換成目的地類型，它會擲回例外狀況。If this method cannot convert the specified object to the destination type, it throws a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.

span.span: Gets the set of properties for this type.

span.span: If no properties should be exposed, this can return .

returns.span: 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 。

span.span: The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設值，型別不傳回任何屬性。By default, a type does not return any properties. 呼叫此方法的簡單實作正確的資料類型的方法。An easy implementation of this method calls the method for the correct data type.
